SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client

Class ClientInfo

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.ClientInfo
public class ClientInfo extends Object
Class representing the information of a client. This class includes the username, last heartbeat, and game ID of a client.
